Categories.Name: bug
Categories.Label: BUGLABEL
Categories.Description: This issue describes a bug in the Go implementation.

Categories.Name: language proposal
Categories.Label: LANGPROPLABEL
Categories.Description: This issue describes a requested change to the Go language specification.

Categories.Name: library proposal
Categories.Label: LIBPROPLABEL
Categories.Description: This issue describes a requested change to the Go standard library or x/ libraries.

Categories.Name: implementation
Categories.Label: IMPLABEL
Categories.Description: This issue describes a semantics-preserving change to the Go implementation.

Categories.Name: access request
Categories.Label: access requestLABEL
Categories.Description: This issue is a request for builder or gomote access.

Categories.Name: pkgsite removal request

Categories.Name: automation
Categories.Label: automationLABEL
Categories.Description: This issue is created by gopherbot or watchflakes automation.

Categories.Name: backport
Categories.Label: backportLABEL
Categories.Description: This issue is created for requesting a backport of a change to a previous Go version.

Categories.Name: builders
Categories.Label: buildersLABEL
